thig2.8:1.1: Authorship is unclear in these verses. The first verse is addressed to the mother. The commentary says it was by her son Abhaya, but I think it is more likely by her daughter Abhayā who features in the next poem.
thig2.8:2.1: The feminine declension of the last words show that this verse is spoken by a woman. The commentary says it was by the mother, who has quoted her son’s words and adds her own. I read both verses as spoken by the daughter.
thig2.8:2.4: It is only from the feminine declension of the last words that we can be sure it is the daughter Abhayā speaking.
